full_sentence: This bothers me more than anything. Yes I get it you want to make life better for the future generations - awesome 100% support that, however giving them luxuries beyond what our own society is able to afford isn't fair.. Giving them a quality of life that is better than our own isn't what helping our descendants is all about. We are forgetting about our own generations and funding for thousands of people to get free stuff and a better way of life than even some of the people already here. I get it, being in charge of fixing a world like ours sucks, however since when did they become more important in the world than everyone else? I'm sorry but that isn't equality.
It is simple! Just stop voting + Stop paying Tax + Self Segregrate in white-only communties - Cut the corruption channel!
What a great success having these Muzzies infest England has been! Like cockroaches in a clean kitchen

One of the big supermarkets in the UK features day-out leaflets for visiting attractions like London zoo. The leaflet features pictures of a weird family visiting the Zoo? From now on I will be boycotting London zoo for good...I wanted to upload the leaflet but I don't know how to do it?

topics.sentence_slice: One of the big supermarkets in the UK
I will be boycotting London zoo for good
